name: Space Project
description:
There's not much to talk about when it comes to the game, but here's a checklist!

- Moveability in space

- Travel to distant planets

- Custom music made by yours truly

- Other small bits and features that you can explore

I don't know what kind of game this will be, but you can vote on it at http://www.strawpoll.me/13768550.

You can also help the development of the game by donating to my project! It would mean the world to me!
